PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-08452018-06-21,  ,  ECCC,  HC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectOrder Adding a Toxic Substance to Schedule 1 to the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
PrecisOrder Adding TOXIC SUBSTANCES TO SCHEDULE 1 TO THE CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999 (CEPA) in order to enable the Government to propose risk management activities under the CEPA to manage potential ecological risks associated with DISPERSE YELLOW 3.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0129 Publication Date: 2018-07-11
AttachmentsAttachment
